title: Secret Conversation
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Hanamaru-chan…. Are you asleep?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>No, Maru is still up. Or rather, Maru isn’t really sleepy….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby isn’t sleepy either. Ruby is so happy to sleep over at Hanamaru-chan’s house that Ruby’s eyes are wide open….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe. Maru is the same zura. Usually we have everyone around, so it’s rare to have a quiet sleepover<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah, that’s right. There’s practice tomorrow, though, so we need to go to sleep quickly….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>But you’re just not getting sleepy, right? Hey, Ruby-chan, want to just talk a little bit more?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby was going to say that too! ….Ah, that was a little loud. Sorry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I think Maru’s family is already asleep, so let’s talk quietly. That’s right, Ruby-chan, hop into Maru’s futon. We can talk easier that way zura<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then…. Ehehe, excuse me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Now we can talk a bunch♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
